name: ReverseText
0:
”Alexa, start reverse text”
”I am funny”
”Tell me anything”
skdetail:
This skill contains: dynamic content.
Invocation Name: reverse text
des: Everything you say to alexa, your alexa will reverse. So you'll get some funny words or sentences. Just try out and have fun :)
priv: The developer reported that this skill does not collect personal information.
